aboutSection.title: About Mave
aboutSection.subtitle: Trusted Aesthetic Clinic in Tijuana, Mexico
aboutSection.p1: At Mave Medical Spa in Tijuana, we combine medical science, aesthetics, and regenerative medicine to deliver personalized, results-driven cosmetic care. Just minutes from the San Diego border, we serve both local clients and patients traveling from across Southern California and beyond; offering safe, ethical treatments with natural-looking results.
aboutSection.p2: Our vision is to be a modern sanctuary for aesthetic wellness, where treatments support confidence, healing, and long-term skin health. We specialize in advanced procedures including:
aboutSection.p3: Our approach is grounded in COFEPRIS-compliant protocols, physician oversight, and highly personalized treatment plans tailored to your unique goals and facial anatomy.
aboutSection.p4: Every patient is treated with intention, clinical precision, and compassionate care, because your transformation deserves both beauty and integrity.

list.lasers: Medical-grade CO2 lasers and IPL photofacials

heroSection.copy: Cross the border for natural-looking results. We specialize in Botox, Sculptra, dermal fillers, PDO threads, radiofrequency microneedling, and laser treatments — trusted by clients from San Diego, Los Angeles, Orange County, Tijuana and beyond.

approach.title: Our Results-Driven Skincare Philosophy in Tijuana
approach.safetyCopy: All cosmetic procedures at Mave Medical Spa in Tijuana are performed or overseen by licensed aesthetic doctors. We adhere to COFEPRIS-compliant safety standards for treatments such as Botox, RF microneedling, Sculptra, and PDO threads.
approach.efficacyCopy: From collagen stimulation to advanced skin tightening, our treatments use FDA-approved technologies and high-performance products that are clinically proven to transform skin health and appearance.
approach.experienceCopy: Your aesthetic journey begins with a skin consultation tailored to your goals. Whether you're seeking wrinkle reduction, skin tightening, or collagen rejuvenation, we create a custom treatment plan with real results.

contactCta.title: Expert Aesthetic Care — Just Minutes from the Border
contactCta.line1: Our Tijuana med spa serves clients from San Diego, LA, Tijuana and beyond —
contactCta.line2: Offering advanced treatments in rejuvenation from Sculptra, RF microneedling, PDO threads, and facial balancing.
contactCta.line3: Book your consultation and get a personalized plan tailored to your goals.
contactCta.aria: Chat with Mave Medical Spa via WhatsApp

packages.title: Flexible Med Spa Packages with Exclusive Savings
packages.subtitle: Get long-lasting aesthetic results without paying full price upfront. Our multi-session packages are perfect for U.S. patients crossing from San Diego and Tijuana locals alike.
packages.item1: Special pricing on bundled services which include Collagen Stimulators (like Sculptra), RF Microneedling (Scarlet S RF), Ultraformer MPT, Dermal Fillers, PDO Threads, and more.
packages.item2: Only 20% deposit required per session so you can skip the financial pressure of full prepayment. Your deposit is fully credited toward your next visit.
packages.item3: Personalized plans combining advanced technologies and proven aesthetic techniques for natural-looking, long-term skin rejuvenation.
packages.item4: Doctor-led care at every stage to ensure safe, effective results from Tijuana’s trusted medical spa professionals.
packages.item5: VIP treatment perks which include priority scheduling, complimentary upgrades, bonus boosters, and access to limited-time medical spa promotions.
packages.bottomCopy: Book your consultation today and discover what’s possible with flexible care at Mave Medical Spa.
